```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
output <- NULL
for(i in 1:1000){
  text <- read.table(file=paste("../Data/Mem_usage/Negtime",i,".txt", sep=""), fill = TRUE , header = TRUE)
  output <- rbind(output, data.frame(used=text$used[1], open=text$free[1] + text$available[1], it=i))
}

plot(x=output$it, y=output$used, main="Negative-Competetively Mediated Dispersal", ylab="Used Mem (Gb)", xlab="iteration (1-1000)")
```
